main event: On August 23, 1955, a potential UFO was observed near Harrisburg, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 10 seconds,The object was described as small, changing colors, and disappearing at high speed,The observer was watching stars at the time of the sighting,The object wobbled along its path from north to south,The sighting was classified as a possible meteor observation but lacked sufficient data for evaluation.
